alert.note: Alert for Cascade; Meagher (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 20 at 1:58AM MST until January 21 at 10:00AM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 10 AM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 2 and 5 inches, with isolated amounts approaching 7 inches. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Little Belt Mountains in Cascade and Meagher Counties, including the United States Highway 89 corridor from Belt to White Sulphur Springs. * WHEN...From 1 PM this afternoon to 10 AM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Thursday evening and Friday morning commutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website. To see a graphical representation of the degree of stress on young livestock please visit our webpage and select Local Programs then Cold Air Advisory for Newborn Livestock.
